annotation_sentence: Um, hello Ayesha. I am bit nervous, you know. It is... difficult subject for me.

annotation_sentence: Ah, the theories part, um, how it is apply in real life. It confuse me.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I try reading notes many time. But, still... uh, not clear.

annotation_sentence: Tomorrow... um, yes, tomorrow work for me. Thank you for help.
